DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study Assess Efficacy Safety SK3530 Patients With Erectile Dysfunction Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: SK3530 potent selective phosphdiesterase type 5 ( PDE 5 ) inhibitor develop treatment erectile dysfunction ( ED ) . Since ED common men hypertension , important determine efficacy safety SK3530 men ED take antihypertensive medication .
